00027 #ifndef MSQ_ELEMENT_PATCHES_CPP
00028 #define MSQ_ELEMENT_PATCHES_CPP
00029 
00030 #include "ElementPatches.hpp"
00031 #include "MeshInterface.hpp"
00032 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00033 
00034 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00035 
00036 ElementPatches::~ElementPatches() {}
00037 
00038 void ElementPatches::get_patch_handles( 
00039                              std::vector<PatchHandle>& patch_handles_out,
00040                              MsqError& err )
00041 {
00042   get_mesh()->get_all_elements( patch_handles_out, err ); MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00043 }
00044 
00045 void ElementPatches::get_patch( PatchHandle patch_handle,
00046                      std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>& elem_handles_out,
00047                      std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle>& free_vertices_out,
00048                      MsqError& )
00049 {
00050   elem_handles_out.clear();
00051   free_vertices_out.clear();
00052   elem_handles_out.push_back( patch_handle );
00053 }
00054 
00055 } // namespace Mesquite
